name: Zombie Frenzy
description:
1. This game uses the unreal engine.

2. This game adopts PBR material.

3. This game adopts the first person perspective.

4. This game can be online on LAN.

5. The game can change the picture quality.

6. The game can turn on the frame rate.

7. The game can switch languages.

8. This game can change the resolution.

9. This game can start vertical synchronization.

10. This game contains multiple maps.

11. Players can pick up different kinds of guns.

12. Players can control characters to jump, squat and walk.

13. Players can change the character's name.

14. Players can change roles.

15. Players can quickly go to the end according to the navigation.
